001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.GradientDescentModelDecomposer;
009
010import java.util.stream.Stream;
011
012public class LinearBasisFunctionModelDecomposer<N extends Number> implements GradientDescentModelDecomposer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> {
013
014    @Override
015    public Stream<GradientDecomposition<N>> calculateDecompositionGradients(LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> model, Vector<N> objectiveGradients, Array<N> inputs) {
016        if (objectiveGradients.getDimensions() != 1) {
017            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Objective gradients must have exactly one dimension");
018        }
019        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = model.getNumberTypeSupport();
020        Array<N> features = model.getFeatureExtractor().extractFeatures(inputs.get(0));
021        Array<N> inputGradients = typeSupport.createArray(features.length() + 1);
022        inputGradients.set(0, objectiveGradients.get(1));
023        for (int i = 0; i < features.length(); i++) {
024            inputGradients.set(i + 1, typeSupport.multiply(objectiveGradients.get(1), features.get(i)));
025        }
026        Vector<N> inputGradientsVector = new TypedVector<>(inputGradients, true, typeSupport);
027        return Stream.of(new GradientDecomposition<>(model, inputGradientsVector));
028    }
029
030}
